Subjects: John the Baptist, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. John the Baptist, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
iN lofe of patriarkis aland of þame þat we prophetis
                    cal…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…one domysday quhen he sal demegud and Il as hyme think
                    queme
